sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { selectCount, selectUserINFO, selectUserInfo, updateUserAsync, } from "../userSlice"; import { selectLoggedInUser } from "../../auth/authSlice"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export default function ProfileUser() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector(selectUserInfo); const editHandle = (updateAddress, index) => { const newUser = { ...user, addresses: [...user.addresses] }; newUser.addresses.splice(index, 1, updateAddress); dispatch(updateUserAsync(newUser)); setEditSelectedIndex(-1); setValue("name"); }; const [editSelectedIndex, setEditSelectedIndex] = useState(-1); const removeHandle = (e, index) => { const newUser = { ...user, addresses: [...user.addresses] }; newUser.addresses.splice(index, 1); dispatch(updateUserAsync(newUser)); }; const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors }, reset, setValue, } = useForm(); return (

Name: {user.name ? user.name : "Guest"}

Email: {user.email}

All Address:

{user.addresses.map((address, index) => (
{editSelectedIndex === index ? (
{ console.log(data); editHandle(data, index); reset(); })} >

Personal Information

Use a permanent address where you can receive your order.

) : null}

Name: {address.name}

Street: {address.street}

City: {address.city}

Postal Code: {address.postalcode}

Country: {address.country}

Province: {address.state}

Phone: {address.phone}

))}
); }
